description.zh-cn: 隋末武将及割据势力首领。其发动江都兵变，弑杀隋炀帝，先后拥立杨浩、之后自行称帝，建立许国。最终被另一位割据势力首领窦建德击败并杀害。
description.en: A general and warlord in the late Sui dynasty. He initiated the Jiangdu coup, assassinated Emperor Yang of Sui, successively enthroned Yang Hao, and later proclaimed himself emperor, establishing the state of Xu. He was ultimately defeated and killed by another warlord, Dou Jiande.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的第二位皇帝，在江都兵变中被宇文化及的手下缢杀。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui dynasty, who was strangled to death by Yuwen Huaji's subordinates during the Jiangdu coup.

description.zh-cn: 隋末割据势力首领之一，自称夏王。他以替隋炀帝复仇为名，击败并处死了宇文化及。
description.en: One of the warlords at the end of the Sui dynasty, who proclaimed himself the King of Xia. He defeated and executed Yuwen Huaji under the pretext of avenging Emperor Yang of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 由宇文化及、司马德戡等人利用骁果军思乡情绪发动的军事政变，导致隋炀帝被杀，隋朝在江南的统治崩溃。
description.en: A military coup initiated by Yuwen Huaji, Sima Dekan, and others, exploiting the homesickness of the Xiaoguo Army. It resulted in the assassination of Emperor Yang of Sui and the collapse of Sui's rule in the Jiangnan region.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝之侄，在江都兵变后被宇文化及拥立为傀儡皇帝，后被宇文化及毒杀。
description.en: Nephew of Emperor Yang of Sui. He was installed as a puppet emperor by Yuwen Huaji after the Jiangdu coup and was later poisoned by him.

description.zh-cn: 北周及隋朝的重要官员，宇文化及之父。他曾帮助杨广夺取皇太子之位。
description.en: An important official of the Northern Zhou and Sui dynasties, and the father of Yuwen Huaji. He helped Yang Guang to secure the position of crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及之弟，积极参与策划江都兵变，后与宇文化及一同被窦建德处死。
description.en: Younger brother of Yuwen Huaji. He actively participated in planning the Jiangdu coup and was later executed along with Yuwen Huaji by Dou Jiande.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及的异母弟，隋炀帝的女婿。在宇文化及败亡前夕离开，后投降唐朝。
description.en: Half-brother of Yuwen Huaji and son-in-law of Emperor Yang of Sui. He left before Yuwen Huaji's downfall and later surrendered to the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝虎贲郎将，江都兵变的主要策划者之一。后因图谋反叛宇文化及而被处死。
description.en: A general of the Sui dynasty and one of the main planners of the Jiangdu coup. He was later executed for plotting a rebellion against Yuwen Huaji.

description.zh-cn: 隋末瓦岗军首领，曾与洛阳的隋朝政权联合抵抗宇文化及，并将其击败。
description.en: Leader of the Wagang Army at the end of the Sui dynasty. He allied with the Sui court in Luoyang to resist Yuwen Huaji and defeated him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宗室将领，奉命讨伐宇文化及，并将其围困于聊城。
description.en: A general from the imperial clan of the Tang dynasty. He was ordered to campaign against Yuwen Huaji and besieged him in Liaocheng.

description.zh-cn: 隋末齐郡叛军首领。他假意协助宇文化及守城，后打开城门放窦建德军队入城。
description.en: Leader of a rebel army in Qi Commandery during the late Sui dynasty. He pretended to assist Yuwen Huaji in defending the city but later opened the gates to let Dou Jiande's army in.

description.zh-cn: 隋末吴兴太守，以讨伐宇文化及为名起兵，是江东地区的割据势力之一。
description.en: Governor of Wuxing Commandery in the late Sui dynasty. He raised an army in the name of punishing Yuwen Huaji and became a warlord in the Jiangdong region.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及在毒杀杨浩后建立的短暂政权。
description.en: A short-lived state established by Yuwen Huaji after he poisoned Yang Hao.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history that succeeded the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceded the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及建立许国后使用的年号。
description.en: The era name used by Yuwen Huaji after he established the state of Xu.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝长子，原为皇太子，后被其弟杨广在宇文述等人的帮助下取代。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Wen of Sui and the original crown prince, he was later replaced by his younger brother Yang Guang with the help of Yuwen Shu and others.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝之女，宇文士及之妻。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Yang of Sui and wife of Yuwen Shiji.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及之子，与父亲一同被窦建德处死。
description.en: Son of Yuwen Huaji, executed along with his father by Dou Jiande.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及之子，与父亲一同被窦建德处死。
description.en: Son of Yuwen Huaji, executed along with his father by Dou Jiande.

description.zh-cn: 宇文士及与南阳公主之子，在宇文化及败亡后被窦建德处死。
description.en: Son of Yuwen Shiji and Princess Nanyang, executed by Dou Jiande after the fall of Yuwen Huaji.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及是宇文述的长子。
description.en: Yuwen Huaji was the eldest son of Yuwen Shu.

description.zh-cn: 宇文智及是宇文化及的同母弟。
description.en: Yuwen Zhiji was Yuwen Huaji's younger full brother.

description.zh-cn: 宇文士及是宇文化及的异母弟。
description.en: Yuwen Shiji was Yuwen Huaji's younger half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及被同谋推举为首领，领导了江都兵变。
description.en: Yuwen Huaji was nominated by his co-conspirators as the leader and led the Jiangdu coup.

description.zh-cn: 司马德戡是江都兵变的主要策划者之一。
description.en: Sima Dekan was one of the main planners of the Jiangdu coup.

description.zh-cn: 江都兵变导致隋炀帝被部下缢杀。
description.en: The Jiangdu coup led to the assassination of Emperor Yang of Sui by his subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 江都兵变后，宇文化及拥立杨浩为傀儡皇帝。
description.en: After the Jiangdu coup, Yuwen Huaji installed Yang Hao as a puppet emperor.

description.zh-cn: 江都兵变导致隋朝皇帝死亡和中央权力真空，加速了隋朝的灭亡。
description.en: The Jiangdu coup resulted in the death of the Sui emperor and a central power vacuum, accelerating the fall of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及为了自己称帝，毒杀了其拥立的傀儡皇帝杨浩。
description.en: In order to proclaim himself emperor, Yuwen Huaji poisoned the puppet emperor Yang Hao whom he had installed.

description.zh-cn: 窦建德击败并俘虏了宇文化及，并将其斩首。
description.en: Dou Jiande defeated and captured Yuwen Huaji, and had him beheaded.

description.zh-cn: 窦建德在处死宇文化及的同时，也诛杀了宇文智及。
description.en: While executing Yuwen Huaji, Dou Jiande also executed Yuwen Zhiji.

description.zh-cn: 窦建德在处死宇文化及的同时，也诛杀了其子宇文承基。
description.en: While executing Yuwen Huaji, Dou Jiande also executed his son Yuwen Chengji.

description.zh-cn: 窦建德在处死宇文化及的同时，也诛杀了其子宇文承趾。
description.en: While executing Yuwen Huaji, Dou Jiande also executed his son Yuwen Chengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 在南阳公主未求情的情况下，窦建德处死了宇文禅师。
description.en: With Princess Nanyang not pleading for his life, Dou Jiande executed Yuwen Chanshi.

description.zh-cn: 李密率军抵抗并击败了宇文化及的北上军队，阻止其西进。
description.en: Li Mi led his army to resist and defeat Yuwen Huaji's northbound forces, preventing them from advancing westward.

description.zh-cn: 唐将李神通奉命攻打宇文化及，并将其围困在聊城。
description.en: The Tang general Li Shentong was ordered to attack Yuwen Huaji and besieged him in Liaocheng.

description.zh-cn: 王薄假意与宇文化及共同守城，后打开城门放窦建德军进入，导致宇文化及被俘。
description.en: Wang Bo pretended to defend the city with Yuwen Huaji, but later opened the gates to let Dou Jiande's army in, leading to Yuwen Huaji's capture.

description.zh-cn: 沈法兴在隋炀帝死后，以讨伐宇文化及为名起兵。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Yang of Sui, Shen Faxing raised an army under the pretext of punishing Yuwen Huaji.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及在发现司马德戡图谋反叛后，将其诱捕并处死。
description.en: After discovering Sima Dekan's plot to rebel, Yuwen Huaji lured him into a trap and executed him.

description.zh-cn: 宇文述曾帮助当时的晋王杨广夺取皇太子之位。
description.en: Yuwen Shu helped Yang Guang, then the Prince of Jin, to secure the position of crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 宇文述帮助杨广取代了杨勇的皇太子之位。
description.en: Yuwen Shu helped Yang Guang replace Yang Yong as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 因与宇文智及是朋友，杨浩在江都兵变中得以保全性命。
description.en: Due to his friendship with Yuwen Zhiji, Yang Hao's life was spared during the Jiangdu coup.
